author: striker
msg: Attempt to regain my sanity, at least partially...  Issue #1481.
* subversion/include/svn_diff.h
(token_compare): API change.  This function is able to return
errors now, and returns the previous returned value via a
passed in pointer.
* subversion/libsvn_diff/token.c
(svn_diff__tree_insert_token): Change to return errors.  Return
new node via the passed in pointer.  Discard the oldest token
instead of the newest.
(svn_diff__get_tokens): Adjust to deal with svn_diff__tree_insert_token
changes.
* subversion/libsvn_diff/diff_file.c
(svn_diff__file_token_t): Change composition.  No longer store pointers
to in-memory lines.  Instead store offsets into files.
(svn_diff__file_baton_t): Change composition.  Need to keep track of
open files and positions therein.  Also provide a placeholder for
reusable tokens.
(read_chunk): New helper.  Reads a chunk from a file at a certain
offset.
(svn_diff__file_datasource_open):  Stop mmap'ing files.  Instead
open a file and read the first chunk of data.
(svn_diff__file_datasource_close): Do nothing.  The token comparison
routines may need a previous datasource open.
(svn_diff__file_datasource_get_next_token): Get a new token, building
an adler32 checksum while reading.  Get next chunk from disk if the
current chunk is exhausted.
(svn_diff__file_token_compare): Adjust for API change.  Return error
when unable to read from disk.  Try to use tokens that are still
in memory before resorting to reading from disk.
(svn_diff__file_token_discard): Put the token into the tokens queue
for recycling.

author: mbk
msg: Add changed-path support to svn_client_blame().  This is accomplished
by walking the log messages *backwards* in order to determine the
paths associated with each revision, and then performing the fulltext
downloading and blame aggregation *forwards*.
* subversion/libsvn_client/blame.c
(#include "svn_path.h"): Added for svn_path_join().
(struct rev): Changed meaning of "path" member.  Added "next" pointer,
for maintaining chronological list of revisions.
(struct log_message_baton): Removed diff-relevant members; diffing now
happens after all log messages have been processed.  Added "eldest",
which points to the head of a chronological list of revisions, and
"path", which holds the working logical path of the file in question.
(log_message_receiver): Removed fulltext-retrieval and diff logic; this
functionality postponed until after all log messages are received.
Updated comments to reflect this change.  Added functionality to
track path changes on a per-revision basis.
(svn_client_blame): Added logic to determine repository root URL and
to perform the revision full-text retrieval and blame aggregation.
Renamed several local variables.

author: kfogel
msg: Helper for work on issue #1490 (libsvn_wc performance) and others:
* configure.in: Add support for --enable-gprof, for GCC at least.
